```{r render, eval=FALSE	}

file <- "001_compress_files.Rmd"
file  <- basename(file)
dir="rmd"

jimTools::ren_pdf(file,dir)
jimTools::ren_github(file, dir)
```


```{r g}
g  <- function(dir) {
out  <- paste0( lubridate::now(), 
								"_archive_",
								"compressed_files.tar.gz"
		)

	tar( tarfile =
			here("compressed", out),
			files=here(dir),  
			compression = c("gzip"))
}

g("rmd")
g("R")
```
